mapper.select: SELECT SFCODE AS sfId, SFNAME AS sfName, CANAME AS caName, SFEMAIL AS sfEmail, SFNUMBER AS sfNumber FROM KMASTERS.SF INNER JOIN KMASTERS.CA ON CACODE = SFRANK WHERE SFCTCODE =#{ctCode} AND ${caCode} = #{caName} ORDER BY SFCODE ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KMASTERS.SF (SFCTCODE, SFCODE, SFPASSWORD, SFNAME, SFRANK, SFEMAIL, SFNUMBER) VALUES(#{ctCode} ,(SELECT MAX(SFCODE) AS sfCode FROM KMASTERS.SF), #{sfPw}, #{sfName}, #{sfRank}, #{sfEmail}, #{sfNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT SFCODE AS sfId, SFNAME AS sfName, CANAME AS caName , SFEMAIL AS sfEmail, SFNUMBER AS sfNumber FROM KMASTERS.SF INNER JOIN KMASTERS.CA ON CACODE = SFRANK WHERE SFCTCODE = #{ctCode} ORDER BY SFCODE ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE KMASTERS.SF SET SFCTCODE = #{sfCtCode} WHERE SFCODE = #{sfId} AND SFNAME =#{sfName} AND SFNUMBER =#{sfNumber} AND SFPASSWORD =#{sfPassword} AND SFEMAIL =#{sfEmail} AND SFRANK =#{sfRank}
mapper.select: SELECT LSNAME AS lsName, TO_CHAR(LSOPEN,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS lsOpen, SFNAME AS sfName ,LSMECOUNT AS lsMeCount FROM KMASTERS.LS INNER JOIN KMASTERS.SF ON SFCODE = LSSFCODE AND SFCTCODE = LSSFCTCODE WHERE LSSFCTCODE =#{ctCode} AND (TO_CHAR(LSOPEN,'YYYY-MM') ='${lsOpen}' OR ${lsName}='${sfName}') ORDER BY LSOPEN ASC

SELECT LSNAME AS lsName, TO_CHAR(LSOPEN,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS lsOpen, SFNAME AS sfName ,LSMECOUNT AS lsMeCount FROM KMASTERS.LS INNER JOIN KMASTERS.SF ON SFCODE = LSSFCODE AND SFCTCODE = LSSFCTCODE WHERE LSSFCTCODE =#{ctCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KMASTERS.LP (LPCTCODE, LPCACODE, LPQTY, LPPRICE) VALUES(#{ctCode},#{caCode},#{lpQty},#{lpPrice})

INSERT INTO KMASTERS.LS (LSSFCTCODE, LSSFCODE, LSCODE, LSNAME, LSOPEN, LSPROGRESS, LSMECOUNT, LSCACODE) VALUES(#{ctCode},#{sfCode},#{lsCode},#{lsName},TO_DATE(#{lsOpen},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ,#{lsProgress},#{lsMeCount},#{caCode})
mapper.select: SELECT LSNAME AS lsName, LSOPEN AS lsOpen, LSSFCODE AS sfCode ,LSMECOUNT AS lsMeCount FROM KMASTERS.LS
